docBody.p: There are some basic truths which should form the corner stone of any plan for National Economic Recovery Security.

list.item: A. That the physically unfit usually beget the physically unfit
B. That the mentally unfit usually beget the mentally unfit

C. That mental defectives, whether low or high grade usually beget mental defectives That we shall never permanently improve the general standard of life until we greatly lessen the population of physically & mentally unfit to the general population

docBody.p: Birth Control is not primarily a movement to help the educated well to do parents control the size of the family–They know this already
It is a movement designed & organized to make available to the poorest & most afflicted of our population scientific information to regulate the size of the family.
It is in my estimation the greatest & most important (effective) instrument which scientific thought has yet devised for raising the mass population to a higher level of life

I wish that our present sentimentalists would realize that the birth of every defective or every potential defective child adds to the weight which lowers the standard of living & general intelligence throughout the country

The stream of children tainted with phys mental diseases still flows unchecked. The cost of institutional care is already gigantic. All ↑public institui↓ are full & overflowing with constant demands for larger quarters & facilities to maintain these ever increasing hordes.
The burden on future generations is already collesal & if it continues fair to destroy our civilization for they already sap the resources of this present generation.
What shall we do about it?

Politicians are influenced in their actions by dogmas fears. Psuedo theorists prefer to blame the [word erased]. The capitalists the economic system the unequal distribution of wealth rather than face the facts & put the blame squarely on those who through their own create slums, inefficiency, deterioration.

The problems created by the rapid & perilous increase of populations. Everyone with internal vision knows the truth of this statement. The nation that can not & will not control its population has is a danger spot in the world. It should be cut off from those nations furthering international peace & international co operation.
